name.value: Advanced Decision to Refuse Treatment SnCT

description.value: A subset of the Snomed-CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK, previously named SnomedCTUK, that describes the advanced decision to refuse treatment (ADTRT) preferences. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK CDA Care Setting Type subset with subset original id 47731000000135.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
